channel.title: Comments on: Tips For Buying An Engagement Ring

item.title: By: EmmaCay
item.dc:creator: EmmaCay
item.description: You make some very good point. But lets remember she is marring the man not the ring. If its really meant to be she shouldn't care about the ring too much. But then again all girls are different and I totally agree with you about talking to the family. Old rings are classic, they have so much history. Also consider whether you and <a href="http://www.ABCthings4u.com" rel="nofollow">white gold</a> or silver.
item.content:encoded: You make some very good point. But lets remember she is marring the man not the ring. If its really meant to be she shouldn’t care about the ring too much. But then again all girls are different and I totally agree with you about talking to the family. Old rings are classic, they have so much history. Also consider whether you and white gold or silver.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: You my friend are a much braver man than I. And I can't believe lead blogger of DV Guru didn't record one of the greatest moments of his life! Atleast when you have a kid promise me you will set-up a live streaming feed so he can get a leg up on lifecasting.
item.content:encoded: You my friend are a much braver man than I. And I can’t believe lead blogger of DV Guru didn’t record one of the greatest moments of his life! Atleast when you have a kid promise me you will set-up a live streaming feed so he can get a leg up on lifecasting.

item.title: By: Randall
item.dc:creator: Randall
item.description:
Dude, I actually picked out Traci's ring without asking her. She loved it! I guess, I'm the one in a million dude, but it was fun.
No proposal on video, only because i'm lame.
Nice work.
item.content:encoded:
Dude, I actually picked out Traci’s ring without asking her. She loved it! I guess, I’m the one in a million dude, but it was fun.

No proposal on video, only because i’m lame.

Nice work.
